nodes.text: Strunk was a human male scavenger who lived on the desert planet Jakku at the time of the Cold War. As a scavenger, he survived by collecting salvage from the Starship Graveyard with his partner, Devi. When Strunk and Devi discovered a Ghtroc Industries 690 light freighter belonging to Rey, a fellow scavenger, the two helped her repair it before stealing the ship and escaping the planet.
Strunk first appeared in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
